QuestData.Title: Gourmet Kafa
QuestData.Description: It was genius: kafa berries go in the goot, seeds come out.$B$BKafa'kota is already rare and worth a fortune, but my invention--Kafa'goot--is GOURMET.$B$BBut it's over now. Uncle is upset and peak is a muss. All that's left is to collect the rest of the Kafa'goot and never make it again.$B$BI won't ask you to gather it--kind of a mussy task, not fit for hero-- just mark it so I can find it easily when the mountain is safe again.
QuestData.CompletionText: On the bright side, Uncle Keenbean can label the last batch of Kafa'goot as "Limited Release" and sell it for even more!
QuestData.RewardText: Great, I'll get up there and... harvest them soon.$B$B<Cousin Gootfur begins wrapping long strips of linen around his hands.>$B$BCan't believe I thought this was a good idea.
